overview: Amara tried to blow up her old science teacher, so she is in deep trouble. Manuel warns her that this is the last straw, and gives her a hard spanking as punishment.  James is in detention because of his ex girlfriend Goldie. She feels bad and goes to apologize, which turns into a sexy romp right inside the detention hall!  Addisons teacher Tommy is sick of her bad attitude, so he tries to call her mother to get her in trouble. Addison wont stand for it, so she distracts Tommy the only way she knows how.  Ziggy needs to make up a gym class, so coach Bill tells her to warm up with some stretching. He cant stop staring at her hot body, and soon theyll be getting really physical.
title: Corrupt Schoolgirls 12
